title: Interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream is one of the dreams that has a large number of connotations. This depends on the gender of the dreamer, whether male or female, and whether the woman is single, married, or pregnant. The interpretation of this vision depends on the color of the wig, whether it is black or blonde. We will try to give some information about seeing a wig on the nipple as general information through which the dreamer can recognize the general picture of the expression of this vision, but without inferring it. We also advise that when dreaming of a vision, it is better to consult a qualified dream interpreter who has forensic knowledge for the correct interpretation. You will also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a wig in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a wig in a dream Researcher Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream can indicate lies, deception, and hypocrisy, as it can indicate many discrepancies in the dreamer’s life, And God knows best. A wig in a dream can also indicate many obstacles and difficulties that the dreamer faces in order to achieve the goals he seeks. In addition to tying hair in a dream, Ibn Sirin believes that it indicates the betrayal of one of the figures close to the dreamer, and God knows best. Also, Wearing a wig in a dream could be an indication of the dreamer’s ability to achieve the dreams he desires - God willing. In addition, Ibn Sirin believes that a wig falling off in a dream is a sign of victory for enemies or failure, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in a dream Vision A wig in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl who sees a wig in a dream may be one of the unwanted dreams that indicate the presence of haters and hypocrites around the girl, and God knows best. Likewise, for an unmarried girl who sees her wig falling out in a dream, this may be one of the The keys to getting rid of the feelings of sadness and distress that the girl was suffering from, and God knows best. Just like one girl dreaming of combing a wig in a dream, this may be an indication that she is dealing with a person who is not suitable for her. In addition to one girl dreaming of a wig falling out from one of the characters That she knows, this may be an indication that she will discover something about this person. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dreamSeeing a wig in a dream for a married womanA married woman who sees in a dream a long wig, this may be one of the indicators that there are some personalities who work To conspire on her behalf. Also, for a married woman to see a short wig in a dream may indicate evil or evil that the woman’s children will be exposed to. As for a wig falling off in a married woman’s dream, it indicates victory over enemies. Also, a blond wig in a married woman’s dream could It is a sign that the husband is unfaithful or that there will be disagreements between them and God knows best. Seeing a wig in a dream for a man. A man who sees a wig in a dream may mean that he is a false, cunning personality.

title: Interpretation of a dream about incest appearing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing incest in a dream, seeing a brother having intercourse with his sister, and seeing intercourse with the dead, according to prominent Arab translators and scholars, are among the dreams that many wonder about, because the vision is disturbing to them. Among the interpretations of inheritance is seeing the mother united in a dream in which the dreamer sees that he is having intercourse with his mother, which indicates that he will be hostile to her and disobedient. Just as the dreamer sees that he is having intercourse with one of his friends, this indicates the dreamer’s desire to get his money. Interpretation of seeing the father having sex with his daughter: The interpretation of seeing a father having sex with his daughter in a dream, where the dreamer sees himself having sex with his daughter in a dream, shows the father’s benefit to his daughter. This indicates that there are problems between the son and the father. The interpretation of a dream about intercourse is that the father sees himself having sex with his daughter, and this indicates that he He adheres to a certain matter and opposes it. Some scholars also interpreted seeing a father having sex with his daughter as an indication of bad behavior towards her. A dream about intercourse between a father and his only daughter indicates her marriage and the cost of this marriage. As for seeing a father having intercourse with his married daughter, this is evidence of her divorce and her return to her father’s house. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of incest with a sister in a dream. Seeing a younger sister having intercourse shows a regrettable look for him. Since he is having sex with his sister, this indicates that he is protecting her and defending her in life. As for the dream of the sister being his wife, it indicates that he was asking for advice and expressing His opinion on many matters. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of incest with the mother in a dream. Seeing intercourse with the mother while the father is already sick indicates the death of the father. Seeing a traveler marrying his mother in a dream indicates his return from travel. Seeing the dreamer colluding with his mother in the event of a dispute between them. It means This dream means that this quarrel will disappear and love will return between them. Seeing a sick person having sex with his mother indicates that this will cure him of his illness. And whoever dreams of accompanying his mother, this indicates the dreamer’s illness and the corruption of his livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about seeing incest with a brother in a dream. Interpretation of seeing incest with a brother In a dream, this indicates the emergence of hostility and competition between them. A brother’s connection to his sister can indicate a strong relationship between them and a relationship of friendship and intimacy. If the dreamer sees that he is in contact with one of his friends, this indicates the desire of the dreamer to obtain his money. Seeing the dreamer having sex with His relative in his dream means that his relatives have been cut off. You take the good and benefit from it. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of incest in a dream for a married woman. Seeing intercourse in a dream has many interpretations that can indicate good or bad. If a married woman sees that her husband has sexual intercourse with her in a dream, this is a good sign of their good relationship, friendship and love. The vision also indicates an improvement in their economic and psychological conditions. If a married woman sees that her husband has had intercourse with another woman in a dream, this indicates psychological fears and problems that may The wife feels lonely and alienated, and it may indicate that the husband is busy with her in other matters, such as new matters. profession. Seeing a man marrying a strange or unknown woman indicates a lot

preview.html: I dreamed that I died through a website when seeing the website roy2a.com. Death is one of the most painful events among the events of the universe, and as many people believe in this belief, it causes sadness and pain to many people, especially those close to the deceased, and there are those who cannot Overcoming such traumas, such as seeing the same person dying in a dream. It is a vision that raises panic and fear, which makes the dreamer flee, realizing what this vision conceals about the good and evil of his life. I dreamed that I saw the Tashahhud and death in a dream, indicating the abundance of good deeds for the dreamer and his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing the ascension of the soul In a dream, in my opinion, he failed in something important that he did in his life. When you see the death of a loved one in a dream, this indicates longevity. It indicates death in a dream, in changing the circumstances of the viewer for the better or in getting older. Seeing someone in a dream tells me that I will die, and the dream indicates To changes in your life for the better. I dreamed that I was going to die. The vision indicates a state of anxiety, fear, psychological problems, and pressure that the dreamer is exposed to due to life’s problems. Seeing death at a known time warns the dreamer to turn away from the bad deeds he committed. See another interpretation: Sad posts about death. I dreamed that I died for the sake of a son Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the same person dying in a dream if he was not sick is a sign of happiness and the achievement of his goals. Seeing death in bed in a dream is an indication that the dreamer has reached a high position, whether in his field of work, trade, or knowledge. Seeing death in a dream indicates the presence of A person is about to get married. Seeing a pregnant woman indicates that she is dying in a dream. She will have an easy and healthy birth for her and her fetus. Seeing death in a dream is considered an indication of the end of problems and crises in the life of the dreamer who is going through this period. If one sees that he will die soon in a dream, the dream A warning to him to repent and return to God and renounce the sins and sins he has committed. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream. I dreamed that I was dying to be free. Seeing death in one dream without screaming. A sign of hearing happy news and joy near him. The vision of knowing the date of my death appears in a person’s dream. The sign To the bad psychological state he is going through, and the intense fear and anxiety he is suffering from during this period. I dreamed that I was going to get married. Seeing death in a dream for a married woman is an indication of good luck on her path and success in her affairs. Seeing the death of a husband without a funeral in a married woman’s dream is an indication of her imminent pregnancy. Vision A married woman died in a dream and he did not complain of any illness, which indicates long life, good health and good news. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing a morgue in a dream. I dreamed that I died pregnant. Seeing death in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the approaching date of her birth. Seeing the death of her husband in a pregnant woman’s dream will give birth to a boy and her birth will be easy. And easy. See another interpretation: I dreamed that I died and then came back to life. We are happy to show you the place to receive your dreams. “I dreamed that I was going to die.” Through the comments, it will be said

title: What is the interpretation of seeing all boiling oil in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadot website provides you with an interpretation of boiling oil in a dream, full boiling oil in a person and signs of burning with boiling oil in a dream. We have collected for you from the books of major scholars interpreting dreams and visions. If you want to know the interpretation of this dream, just follow the article. Why dream of boiling oil falling on a person? Interpretation of boiling oil in a dream, complete, which falls on the dreamer and he suffers burns, shows that there are many enemies besides the dreamer who want him to fall into the grave, So he must be very careful. Seeing a dream full of boiling oil that burns a person is a sign that the dreamer will feel insulted and jealous of some people. This vision shows the dreamer that he will face some problems and fears in the next period of his life, and these are unpleasant visions. See Also: Why does hot water dream in a dream? Why do we dream that oil is falling to the ground? Seeing boiling oil falling to the ground by a dreamer in a complete dream is a sign that in his next life there will be some obstacles in the financial situation, but they will pass. In addition to that Seeing oil falling on the ground in a dream indicates that the areas on the dreamer’s body indicate that he is committing serious sins, so he must quickly repent and return to God. Also, the appearance of completely boiling oil in a dream sometimes indicates weakening and improving conditions and shows the dreamer’s salvation from... All his problems. See also: Why obesity in a dream Burning boiling oil is complete in a dream A dreamer who burns in a dream full of boiling oil is evidence that he will commit harmful acts and expose him to many problems. Seeing boiling oil burning indicates that the dreamer is suffering from material hardship and the person may go through this And it causes sadness. Why dream of boiling oil for obese women? Seeing boiling oil for a common woman in a dream is a complete indication of the happiness and joys that will come to her and her family life. Also, to see boiling oil spilled on the floor in a dream for an anxious girl – to the good news of relief and getting rid of problems. Seeing Boiling oil and food inside are good news and a sign that her wedding is approaching and that everything is fine, God willing. See also: Why do you dream of seeing the cup in a complete dream? Why does a married woman dream of boiling oil? Watering the ground for a married woman in a dream filled with boiling oil is evidence of a cessation of Her worries, problems, and her situation improve. The presence of boiling oil in a woman’s bedroom in a full dream is a sign that she will make a lot of money in the near future. Pouring boiling oil in a dream is full of visions for a woman that indicate problems between her and her husband. Why does a pregnant woman dream of boiling oil? Why does a pregnant woman dream that oil is poured in a dream as a sign of freedom from worries and freedom from pain. Oil in a dream filled with a pregnant woman indicates the ease of childbirth, her deliverance from problems, and the care of a child free of diseases. See also: Why dream of potatoes in bunchesIf you have a dream and want to interpret it ,

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing defending a cause in a dream

preview.html: Defending a case in court is one of the powers of a lawyer, but some people are exposed to seeing the defense of a case in a dream, which prompts them to search for the many positive meanings and connotations that this vision indicates, especially since dream interpreters differed in clarifying the many different meanings that this vision indicates, and this is what We will explain to you in detail. Interpretation of the dream of numbers in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the vision of defending a cause in a dream. Some interpreters believe that the dreamer’s defense of any matter in his dream may be the result of injustice to the dreamer of this vision by some of those around him or injustice in his current field of work. It may be Seeing defending a cause in a dream is the dreamer’s attempt to achieve justice and equality as much as possible in all aspects of his life. Defending a cause in a dream could be one of the signs that an unmarried woman dreams of her engagement to someone with whom she does not feel psychologically comfortable and wants to separate from him. Interpretation of a dream about burning In the dream in detail. A test in a dream. Seeing a test in a dream indicates that the dreamer has committed a major sin in his life and is trying to get rid of it and repent of this sin. A test in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is exposed to some problems and crises that may require someone to stand by him. Seeing a test in a dream could be one of the signs that the dreamer is in competition or enmity with some people around him. Interpretation of seeing the Antichrist in a dream in detail. Losing a case in a dream Losing a case in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into financial trouble and be exposed to many... Financial losses. Losing a relationship in a dream can be one of the signs of a dispute or quarrel between the married dreamer and the other partner. Losing a case in a dream also indicates the victory of the dreamer’s enemies over him in the context of his social life. Some interpreters believe that losing a case indicates that insight is being abandoned. The current job he works in. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s letter B. Interpretation of a dream about filing a lawsuit against a person. If the dreamer sees that he is taking the case to a well-known person in the dream, this indicates the strength of trust that the dreamer has in that person. Referring the case to A certain person is a sign that the visionary is in trouble, and this person can play an important role in getting him out of this crisis. Bringing the issue to one of the people in the dreamer’s life can be one of the signs that the dreamer will enter into a successful business with this person or He participates in a successful deal with him. Interpretation of a dream about a pulpit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about being summoned by the court. If the dreamer sees that the court is calling him, this means that the dreamer has a problem in his current field of work. As for the married woman who sees the court summoning her in a dream, this indicates She will be involved with the husband, but there will be some parties that will intervene in resolving this dispute and this problem. The summons to court that appears in a pregnant woman’s dream could be a sign of the approaching date of birth for this woman, and accordingly

title: Interpretation of seeing flour in a dream and the symbol of flour in a dream

preview.html: Seeing flour in a dream symbolizes food, comfort, and great knowledge, and whoever sees white flour in a dream, this indicates goodness and living, and seeing flour fermenting in a dream indicates a journey and perhaps a struggle over goals. The dream indicates goodness and living. Profits and gains. Interpretation of seeing flour in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained seeing flour in a dream as an abundance of sustenance, the declaration and emergence of the truth, and rest after fatigue. Perhaps this vision indicates great knowledge, travel, money, and equipment. Whoever sees wheat flour in a dream, this indicates that he will gain For a living, dreaming of rice flour denotes grace, gifts, and consideration. Semolina in a dream indicates a person is a competent husband. Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing flour in a dream means fortress, fortress, religion, and guidance. title: Interpretation of seeing the meanings of marriage in a dream

preview.html: There are many different interpretations of the meanings of marriage in a dream, so we find that these clues are multiple. For example, it may be buying a new ring or shoes, or buying new clothes, or buying a new ring, as all of these signs indicate an imminent marriage, and it varies according to the dream and according to the dreamer. In this article, we learn about these different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wind in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the meanings of marriage in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees the color white in her dream, this is one of the signs of the imminent marriage of that girl. Also, when an unmarried girl sees in Her dream is that she is wearing a beautiful dress, then this is one of the indicators of the date of her upcoming wedding. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a beautiful abaya, this indicates the imminence of her marriage. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is entering the Holy Kaaba, this indicates the approaching date of her wedding. Also, when an unmarried girl sees in her dream a car entering the house, this is one of the signs that her marriage is approaching. If the unmarried girl has short hair and sees in a dream that her hair is long, this may mean that she will get married soon. Likewise, when a girl sees An unmarried girl in her dream that rain is falling in her house, this indicates that her marriage is imminent. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is divorced and unmarried, this means that her wedding date is imminent. Also, if an unmarried girl sees honey in her dream, it may mean The date of her wedding is approaching. Interpretation of a dream about seeing acne in a dream. Seeing the meanings of marriage in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying someone other than her husband whom she does not know, this is strong evidence that this woman will obtain a great benefit. If a married woman dreams that she If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a religious man, this indicates abundant livelihood for that woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a dead man, this means that the situation of That woman will change for the worse. Interpretation of the dream of seeing forgiveness in a dream. Seeing the meanings of marriage in a dream for the divorced woman, widow, and pregnant woman. Interpretation of the dream of seeing falling in a dream. If the divorced woman dreams that she is about to get married, this is a sign that good things will come to her and that she will return to her ex-husband again. If a widow sees that she is marrying someone other than her deceased husband, this indicates her husband’s high status. Likewise, if a widow sees in her dream that she is marrying someone other than her dead husband, this indicates the arrival of blessings and abundance for this woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she will get married, this is evidence However, this woman will give birth to a girl.Interpretation of a dream about seeing chocolate in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the meanings of marriage in a dream for a young man.Interpretation of a dream about seeing miserliness in a dream.If a young man sees in his dream that he is buying a new bed, this indicates the approaching date of his wedding. Likewise, if the young man sees a woman’s vagina In his dream, this indicates that he is on...

title: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fire in a dream: A cat is a pet that roams homes and is owned by many people. Seeing it in a dream is unpopular and indicates evil, conspiracy, envy, and bad friends. As well as for divorced women and widows, and presenting the interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, ancient and modern, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin? If a young man sees a flame from a fire in his house, this indicates the approach of his marriage. Seeing a glowing fire in The dream indicates the attainment of glory and status that the dreamer enjoys, such as a job with a rewarding salary. Seeing a fire in the middle of the day indicates strife and family problems that may cause hostility and strife. What is the interpretation of a dream about a fire and extinguishing it? Seeing a fire or a burning fire in the house indicates the presence of problems. Marital disputes may lead to separation and divorce. Seeing extinguishing a fire in a dream for a married woman indicates overcoming problems and difficulties. Seeing a fire and fire in the kitchen indicates high prices and a lack of financial resources. Seeing yourself escaping from a fire indicates getting rid of problems, finding appropriate solutions, and removing worries. What is the interpretation of a dream about setting fire to an unmarried woman? Seeing a fire in a girl’s dream means engagement or marriage soon. If an unmarried girl sees that a fire has burned her, this indicates that her marriage is approaching if she gets engaged. What is the interpretation of a dream about a fire that burns a person? If The dreamer saw that someone threw him into the fire. This indicates hatred and hostility from some people, but God will save him. Seeing the fire burning with sound and rising smoke indicates a serious dispute that may lead to disputes and hostilities between spouses or between family members. Seeing an electrical fire in a man’s dream means failure. At work or abandoning one’s job. What is the interpretation of a dream about a fire in a relative’s house? Seeing a fire in a relative’s house indicates many family problems and disagreements that may lead to quarrels and disagreements. Seeing a fire extinguished indicates eliminating problems and eliminating disputes, and it can It also indicates settling debts. What is the interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream? Seeing a fire going out to the owner of a position or state indicates isolation from his work or isolation from his condition. Seeing a fire being extinguished is evidence of the suppression and disappearance of strife. Seeing a fire being extinguished and lighting it may indicate that thieves They entered the dreamer’s house. Seeing the fire going out and going out for the owner of the orchard may indicate his death or the death of one of his children. What is the interpretation of a fire in a dream in the house? Seeing a fire in the house indicates radical changes at all levels that will happen to the dreamer and will change the course of his life for the better. Seeing a fire in the house indicates To a disaster or calamity. Seeing fire falling from the sky onto homes indicates great turmoil and sadness that some people suffer from. We are happy to see you get your dream of “interpretation of seeing fire” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond, and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling home furniture in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about selling home furniture in a dream. Here we learn about all the interpretations that talk about selling furniture in a dream and whether it is a good or bad vision. Tell us all about the interpretations that talk about this dream. Interpretation of a dream of selling home furniture in a dreamAnyone who dreams that he is selling home furniture is a sign of imminent marriage. Dreaming of selling home furniture in a dream is a sign of positive changes. When you dream of selling home furniture, this is a sign of Nutrition. If one sees that he is selling home furniture, this is an indication that his fears will go away. Seeing spacious home furniture in a dream is a sign of good morals. Interpretation of a dream about bride furniture in a dream Whoever sees bride furniture in his dream indicates marriage to a relative. The bride’s dream about her furniture in The dream is a sign of her connection to someone. Seeing the furniture of a married woman’s bride in a dream is evidence of her good lineage. Dreaming about furniture in a dream is generally a good sign for someone who has a vision. Interpretation of a dream about painting furniture. Whoever sees in his dream that he is painting home furniture, it is a sign of peace. And security for the family. Dreaming of painting home furniture in a dream is very good. When you see paint on the furniture in the home, this is an indication that he is trying to hide the defects in it. Painting home furniture in a dream is a sign of happy news that a person will receive. Interpretation of dreams of changing office furnitureA person who Dreaming that he is changing office furniture in a dream is a sign of a promotion at work. Dreaming of changing office furniture in a dream is a sign of a great financial reward. Whoever sees in his dream that he has changed office furniture, this is a sign of changes that will occur in his life. Moving office furniture is a sign of change. Going abroad and buying new furniture is a sign of feelings of stress, anxiety and sadness. Moving office furniture to another office furniture is a sign of adapting to the external social environment surrounding it. Interpretation of a dream about changing home furniture: Whoever sees in his dream that he is changing home furniture, this is a sign of the arrival of good news. A woman dreamed Married that she changed the furniture in the house, which indicates abundant income. Buying new furniture in a dream is a sign of positive changes that will occur in her life. When you see yourself buying old furniture in a dream, this is a sign of many problems and worries. Replacing bedroom furniture with The last sign of goodness and life. Interpretation of a dream about moving home furniture. Whoever sees in his dream that he is moving home furniture, this is a sign of positive changes occurring in his life. A dream about moving furniture is a sign of changing conditions and circumstances. When you see that the old house furniture has been moved with new furniture This is a sign of improved living conditions. Seeing moving furniture in a dream is a sign of a new home or a new position. Seeing furniture being moved is a sign of getting rid of problems and crises. A man who dreams of moving his furniture is evidence of his good behavior. Interpretation of a dream of destroying home furniture. Whoever saw in Dreaming that he is demolishing house furniture is a sign of calamity and hatred. Dreaming of demolishing house furniture is a sign of death

title: Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing birds: Birds are animals characterized by two wings with which they fly, some of which are edible and others are not, and seeing them in a dream means guardianship and authority. Through the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing birds in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, or contemporary translators, so follow us on the vision website. Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream by Ibn SirinIf one sees a bird in his dream Torment, announcing that this man is characterized by strength and that he is a warlord and is not safe near or far, and the osprey chick appears as a brave boy. Seeing a man eating duck meat indicates that he took money from a woman. Seeing ducks in a dream indicates people of piety and wealth. Interpretation of seeing birds in a dreamIf you see a nest falling in A dream about a man can indicate the return of an absent person and a traveler. If one sees birds of prey in his dream, it indicates hearing sad news or the death of a close person. Dinner table. If a man sees in a dream that he is hunting birds of prey, it indicates a disobedient son to his parents. Seeing a bird carrying a bird on his back in a man’s dream can indicate anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of seeing birds for singles In a dream, if a girl sees many birds in happy colors, this suggests romance and that she Dreaming personality: A single woman’s dream of seeing birds flying over our heads indicates leadership and fame. Seeing birds in a dream indicates happy news and occasions. Interpretation of seeing birds for a married woman in a dream. If a married woman sees an unknown bird in her dream, give a warning to the dreamer and advise him. Seeing a bird coming from the sky in a woman’s dream Married denotes one’s position, high status, and hearing new happy news. Seeing large birds in a married woman’s dream announces the person and the rich. Interpretation of bird watching for pregnant women in a dream: Seeing a male bird or a colorful bird in a pregnant woman’s dream denotes easy childbirth and the birth of a new baby. And her freedom from anxiety. Seeing white birds in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth and many good things in the fortuneteller’s life. Interpretation of seeing birds for divorced women and widows in a dream: If the divorced woman or widow sees birds of prey such as the hawk and the eagle, it indicates the extent of his importance and his leadership or governmental position. Or look for a prestigious job. Seeing a bird’s nest in the dream of a divorced woman and a widow indicates safety, comfort, food, the death of worry and anxiety, and the satisfaction of desires. Interpretation of dreams: Many birds in the sky. Seeing birds flying over the dreamer’s head announces a messenger bringing him news. Whoever sees birds flying above his head indicates gaining leadership and power. Interpretation of a dream about black birds attacking me. Seeing black birds in a man’s dream shows that many sins have been committed. Seeing black birds attacking in a dream indicates bad behavior and hearing sad news. Interpretation of dreams: colorful birds. If a man sees colorful birds in his dream and his wife is pregnant, he mentions the birth of a new baby. Colorful birds indicate mixing between Good and bad
